text:
You quickly search the bodies. You find several SHURIKEN. You do not have the expertise to use them properly, but you can take them anyway.

A more interesting item is a long thin sword of CRESCENTIUM STEEL SWORD. This is so flexible that it can be worn wrapped around the waist under a belt which is presumably why the dead assassin thought it was useful.

You also find a SMALL BOTTLE OF MAUVE LIQUID.

You return to the main square and see if you have better luck finding a patron.
